mapper.insert: insert into word_books(userId, wordId, wordDate) values(#{userId}, #{wordId}, current_timestamp())
insert into words (word, pronunciation, level, wordAudioUri) values (#{word}, #{pronunciation}, #{level}, #{wordAudioUri})
mapper.update: update words set wordAudioUri= concat("/study/word/audio/", (select wordId from words where word = #{word}),".wav") where word = #{word}
